name: Guild's Adventure
description:
primeiro jogo desenvolvido durante meu estudo no primeiro semestre da faculdade.

artes usadas no jogo:

https://opengameart.org/content/treasure-chest-sprite -  treasure chest

https://opengameart.org/content/backgrounds-for-2d-platformers - background stage 1

https://opengameart.org/content/seamless-cave-background - background stage 3

https://opengameart.org/content/lpc-goblin - goblin stage 1

https://opengameart.org/content/1-hour-lpc-enemy - flying creature stage 1

https://opengameart.org/content/a-platformer-in-the-forest - platform art stage 1 and 2

https://opengameart.org/content/forgotten-dungeon - platform art stage 3

os mobs das fases  2 e 3, além dos personagens principais foram desenvolvidos pela Ana Laura Martini Ferreira
